_header: O holy Saint George O very champion
_description: Divers heroes of the family of Willoughby in a poem by James Packe ‘out of an old roll of parchemin’ — eight stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar245.First Lines:
O holy St George O very ChampionO vndefyled O most holy
                    knight…
BLHar245.Last Lines:
…Cause me to heere Rex splendens songen on hyeBefore the
                    Trinitie when that I shall dye
BLHar245.Note:
Folio number reflects most recent foliation of MS. Heading in upper
                    margin reads, ‘Out of an old Roll in parchemin’ (f.
                    105v).
